text: Things are going to get feisty when The Real Housewives of Orange County crew sits down to hash out all of Season 13's drama and beefs. From learning whatever ` ` the hidden secret of Orange County'' is to shocking allegations and everything in between ( including a surprising twist in Tamra Judge and Shannon Beador's friendship ), the upcoming RHOC reunion looks like it will leave no stone unturned, as you can see from the teaser above. Speaking of Tamra, Andy Cohen shared this little tidbit with her before hitting the couches : ` ` I never know what to expect from you at reunions.''
